tool.name: Minfi Rset
tool.description: store Beta values and/or M values

configfiles.configfile:
require("minfi", quietly = TRUE) MSet <- get(load('$mset'))
RSet <- ratioConvert(MSet, what = "both", keepCN = TRUE)
save(RSet,file = '$rset')

param.name: mset
param.label: MethylSet
param.help: This class holds preprocessed data for Illumina methylation microarrays, mapped to a genomic location.

tool.help:
**What it does**
Minfi Rset convert methylation data from methylation and unmethylation channels, to ratios (Beta and M-values).
**Input information**
Input data is MethylSet class R object (i.e. output from Minfi Mset Tool) holding preprocessed data for Illumina methylation microarrays, mapped to a genomic location.
**Output information**
Minfi Rset as a result return RatioSet class R object holding preprocessed data for Illumina methylation microarrays. It contains respectively the Beta value matrix, M value matrix and the Copy Number matrix and can also be used as i.e. input in Minfi Map to Genome Tool to find genomic position.
